Description: Painted wooden shabti of Amenemipt, Priest of Amun with a black lappet-wig, a red modelled face with black eyes, a blue collar and crossed red hands holding two red hoes; the front of the leg section(damaged) is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a yoke with two red nw-pots and a red seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
